title: Real field of view when recording with Hololens
description:
When the Hololens record an application. Microsoft cheat by amplifying the camera view. Giving a false impression to outsider on the reality of the device. I did a tool allowing the overprint in Unity the real field of view during the recording.
Info : http://eloistree.com/
author: Éloi Strée, ꬲ🧰: Raw video
